knimeNode.name: Kafka Connector
knimeNode.shortDescription: Provides connection settings to a Kafka Cluster.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows to define any information that is needed to create a connection with Kafka.

tab.name: Settings
tab.option: A list of host/port pairs used for establishing the connection to the Kafka cluster. This list has to be in the form host1:port1,host2:port2,....

tab.name: Advanced Settings
tab.option: Allows to specify additional connection related options, e.g., timeouts and Kerberos authentication.

ports.outPort: Connection details used by Kafka Consumer and Producer nodes
